RTCPeerConnectionCreateAnswer.summary: The createAnswer() method of the interface creates an {{Glossary("SDP")}} answer to an offer received from a remote peer during the offer/answer negotiation of a WebRTC connection.

remarks.para:
The answer contains information about any media already attached to the session, codecs and options supported by the browser, and any ICE candidates already gathered.
The answer is delivered to the returned , and should then be sent to the source of the offer to continue the negotiation process.

RTCPeerConnectionCreateAnswer.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} whose fulfillment handler is called with an object conforming to the dictionary which contains the SDP answer to be delivered to the other peer.
